reviewText: got to watch this movie today, i have been after this for a long while. and i must say i was well pleased with this DVD. first of all the print is very good for such a lost gem, and it's in English dubbed (my personal favorite) and secondly it is WIDESCREEN : 0 ) so no people figthing of the side of the the screen.... I also like the artwork that came with it. so all in all i now own all three titles by this new company (Forth Strike) and i am now looking forward to seeing what titles they release in the future.
